File libsrc/libgmethod/AmpFactor.c

Public Function Index

new_AmpFactor (double, const char *)
Create an AmpFactor object.
AmpFactor_addMethod ()
Register the AmpFactor as a readable GMethod.

Public Functions

new_AmpFactor 
 AmpFactor new_AmpFactor(double factor,
                         const char *comment)
Create an AmpFactor object. AmpFactor is a GMethod object that multiplies a waveform's amplitude by a factor.

Parameters:
factor - the input amplitude factor.
Returns:
an AmpFactor object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
AmpFactor_addMethod 
 void AmpFactor_addMethod()
Register the AmpFactor as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before an AmpFactor is read from a file.
